caption: Relating to changing the eligibility of certain persons to receive community supervision, including deferred adjudication community supervision.
undersanding:
Summary (English):
This bill modifies Texas criminal law to make illegal aliens ineligible for any form of community supervision or deferred adjudication. While not specifically targeting Chinese immigrants, it affects any non-citizens who entered the US without proper inspection or failed to maintain their legal immigration status. This includes Chinese nationals who have overstayed their visas or entered without proper documentation.

Summary (Chinese):
该法案修改德克萨斯州刑事法律，规定非法移民不得获得社区监督或缓期判决等形式的缓刑。虽然并非专门针对中国移民，但会影响所有未经适当检查入境或未能维持合法移民身份的非公民。这包括签证逾期停留或无证入境的中国公民。

Most likely committees:
1. Criminal Justice Committee
2. State Affairs Committee
3. Border Security Committee
